articles.title: U.S. Secret Service shot and killed armed man who entered the secure perimeter of Mar-a-Lago
articles.description:
Although Trump often spends weekends at his resort, he was at the White House during this incident.

summary: U.S. Secret Service shot and killed an armed man at Mar-a-Lago on February 22.

Increased security measures may affect local events and residents near Mar-a-Lago.

articles.title: Methuen woman searching for her wedding dress after dry cleaner mix-up
articles.description:
A preservation box, a Facebook post, and a 15-year mystery — Kathleen Shea Dunleavy is hoping to be reunited with her wedding gown.

The post Methuen woman searching for her wedding dress after dry cleaner mix-up appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Kathleen Shea Dunleavy seeks her wedding dress lost for 15 years due to a dry cleaner mix-up.
She posted on Facebook to find her gown, which holds significant sentimental value.
The incident highlights challenges residents face with local dry cleaning services.

articles.title: NFL receiver Rondale Moore found dead in his Indiana hometown
articles.description:
Rondale Moore, the NFL receiver who had season-ending training camp knee injuries in each of the last two years after a standout college career at Purdue and a promising start with the Arizona Cardinals, was found dead Saturday, authorities said

The post NFL receiver Rondale Moore found dead in his Indiana hometown appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: NFL receiver Rondale Moore was found dead in Indiana on Saturday.
Moore, a Purdue standout, faced season-ending injuries in the last two years.
His death raises concerns about mental health and athlete support in Boston.

articles.title: Former ‘American Idol’ contestant charged with murder, staging crime scene in wife’s slaying in Ohio
articles.description:
Authorities in Ohio have arrested a former contestant on “American Idol” and charged him with shooting and killing his wife and staging the crime scene to mislead investigators

The post Former ‘American Idol’ contestant charged with murder, staging crime scene in wife’s slaying in Ohio appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Former 'American Idol' contestant charged with murder of his wife in Ohio.
Authorities allege he staged the crime scene to mislead investigators.
Boston residents may reflect on domestic violence issues highlighted by this case.

articles.title: Homeland Security suspends TSA PreCheck and Global Entry airport security programs
articles.description:
The U.S. Department of Homeland Security is suspending the TSA PreCheck and Global Entry airport security programs as a partial government shutdown continues

The post Homeland Security suspends TSA PreCheck and Global Entry airport security programs appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Homeland Security suspends TSA PreCheck and Global Entry programs amid ongoing government shutdown.
Boston Logan Airport travelers will face longer security lines without expedited screening options.
Suspension affects thousands of local residents relying on these programs for efficient travel.

articles.description:

articles.title: Here’s how the Red Sox plan on handling MLB’s new ABS challenging system
articles.description:
Wilson Contreras was the first Red Sox to test out the system, winning his challenge in spring training Saturday.

summary: Wilson Contreras successfully tested MLB's new ABS challenging system during spring training on February 22.
Red Sox manager Alex Cora outlines strategies for utilizing the ABS system effectively this season.
Boston fans can expect improved game management and potentially fewer controversial calls in 2023.
